CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Investment goal of long-term growth of capital. The Fund normally invests at least 65% of its assets in equity securities. The Sub-Adviser uses a value approach to invest the Funds assets in a limited number of domestic and foreign companies.
